author: ansgar.eth
content:
As mentioned on last week's acd, <@486501030046203915> and I will host the first "Protocol Research Call" today, in 45min. Idea is to make this a monthly call to talk about the parts of the roadmap still in research stage.

The main topic today will be the future roles of home nodes on the network.

- Agenda: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/protocol-research-call/23261/6
- Zoom: https://ethereumfoundation.zoom.us/j/87851516879?pwd=9f6joDJmeu9WWfY20tvJrfjdeYjsrS.1&jst=3
- YouTube stream: https://www.youtube.com/live/m5HFO4DYckQ
- X stream: https://x.com/EthCatHerders/status/1907125084764217734

Would be nice to see some of you all on the call!
